timeline.role: Lead UX Designer & Senior Frontend Developer
timeline.description: Leading design and development of enterprise incident management platform. Built comprehensive design system and reduced incident resolution time by 35%.
achievements: Redesigned notification system handling 10M+ daily alerts
Reduced misconfiguration rate by 14% through better UX
Built design system with 45 reusable components

timeline.description: Led product design for investment banking mobile app serving 5M+ users. Increased DAU by 28% and achieved 4.8★ App Store rating through user-centered design.
achievements: Designed mobile-first platform managing $2B+ in assets
Achieved 4.8★ App Store rating with 10K+ reviews

timeline.description: Built design system from ground up unifying 12 products. Created 120+ components, established governance, and achieved 70% faster component development.
achievements: Created comprehensive design system with 120+ components
Unified 12 product teams under single design language

timeline.description: Redesigned patient portal for 2M+ patients. Improved accessibility to WCAG 2.2 AA, reduced support calls by 40%, and achieved 89% task completion rate.
Designed AI-powered travel booking platform. Increased booking conversion by 31%, optimized search performance to 1.8s, and achieved 4.7★ user rating.
Designed and built websites, brand identities, and digital campaigns for Fortune 500 clients. Specialized in conversion optimization and user engagement.
achievements: Specialized in conversion optimization and analytics
Built expertise in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and PHP
